title: Freebsd 6.1 installlation error about go_bootstrap
body:
by **eiffelqiu**: 
My server run Freebsd, version is 6.1-RELEASE-p3

when i download i386 version go source file and run go/src/all.bash

it has the following error

clean -i std


I run tcsh and set all the requried system variable

setenv GOROOT ~/go
setenv GOARCH 386
setenv GOOS freebsd
setenv GOBIN ~/go/bin
setenv PATH ~/go/bin:$PATH

Did i do something wrong? i install go from /usr/ports/lang/go by using "sudo make
install", same error happened.

help me
